data.message: Hi! What do if I cannot log back into fb on my phone? I signed up in 2009 so I have no idea what my password was or the password for the email that I signed up under. I have entered all the security questions and it is still not letting me back in?

replies.message: Hi Holly. If you're having trouble logging into your Facebook account, here are a few things to try first: http://bit.ly/2A3nr2E. You can also learn how to regain access to your account here: http://bit.ly/2z1nSwY. Additionally, if the problem continues, please report it to us: http://bit.ly/2z1V19a. Please keep in mind it goes against Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account. -Tenaya
